Name: Canon EOS R5 Mirrorless Camera Body
Description: Building on the established legacy of Canon full frame cameras and the successful EOS R and RP mirrorless cameras, the Canon EOS R5 Mirrorless Digital Camera Body brings next-generation processing power, image quality, performance and build quality to the market. It’s the ideal camera for photographers and cinematographers who are looking for cutting-edge technology for anything from weddings, portraits, sports, landscape, high-end cinema, and more.nn  NEW FIRMWARE UPDATEnnnnnCutting-edge quality with an all-new 45MP CMOS sensornAt the heart of the EOS R5 is a newly developed, 45MP full frame CMOS sensor. The highest resolution mirrorless camera available from Canon, the R5 will excel when shooting even the most demanding of subjects.
